rules_text:
When this creature dies, choose one–
• Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
• Remove two counters from target permanent an opponent protects. You gain 2 life. [i](Players protect permanents that can be attacked.)[/i]
Repair 3 [i](When this creature dies, you may exile it with three time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)[/i]
